name: estimated_salary
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jsearch.
Tool description: Fast and Simple searches for jobs posted on LinkedIn, Indeed, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, Dice and others, all in a single API.
API description: Fetch the estimated salary for a given job title within a specified radius around a particular location.

location.description: The geographic location to search within for the salary estimation.

job_title.description: The job title for which the salary estimation is to be fetched.

radius.description: The radius in kilometers within which to search from the provided location. Default is 100 km.
